p: In conclusion, the chemical composition, as well as the total phenolic content (TPC) and the potential antioxidant and antimicrobial activity, of three Kainari-herbal teas from different areas of Lesvos Island (Greece) was evaluated. All samples exerted very broad and strong antimicrobial activities against almost all Gram-positive and Gram-negative human pathogenic bacteria, as well as strong antioxidant activities.
